item.description:
Come hang out and talk books with other bookish people in this interesting part of town. New members are always welcome!

On the agenda is our regular book-themed schmoozing, accompanied by bookcrossing-registered books. (http://www.bookcrossi...) This location has free wi-fi, so if you forget to register your books or you're not sure how, you can register them on the spot. (Bringing books is optional.)

This location is T-accessible, located near Coolidge Corner on the green line.

See you there!
item.how_to_find_us: Look for the group with books on the table and a sign with the Bookcrossing logo
item.name: The Bookcrossing April Meetup -- Saturday Chapter
